edu.stanford.services.explorecourses

Class ExploreCoursesConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.services.explorecourses.ExploreCoursesConnection

  • public class ExploreCoursesConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    ExploreCoursesConnections will allow an application to query the ExploreCourses database for information. Calls to this class may require network communication to Stanford's database servers, and can therefore be slow/blocking. Users of this class may want to cache results in their own database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExploreCoursesConnection()
      Establishes a connection to the default (production) ExploreCourses server.
      ExploreCoursesConnection(java.net.URL server)
      Establishes a connection to the specified server.
